name: api-test-phase1-ui
description: Problem (short): teams waste time finding gaps in APIs because writing exhaustive tests is slow and error-prone; NL test intents are underspecified and developers miss edge-cases. Solution (short): provide a tool that turns short natural-language pointers into broad, prioritized request-variation test suites, runs those tests (auto/manual), and surfaces all non-2xx results with the exact request that triggered them â€” so teams discover issues fast without writing dozens of hand-crafted tests.
author: torkura
